alert.note: Alert for Modoc County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 3:22PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Modoc County through 345 PM PDT... At 320 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Canby, or 11 miles southwest of Alturas, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Modoc County, but will cross State Route 299 between Canby and Alturas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
